title: Neil Gaiman's Myths
description: Neil Gaiman discusses "Norse Mythology"; Sarah Lyall talks about Ali Smith's "Autumn"; and Nick Bilton on two new books about Silicon Valley.
author: books@nytimes.com (The New York Times)
